3987279d-0ad4-4afb-8ca9-5b256ae3b298.preperation: I use smaller tomatoes so there are less seeds (mine are just a bit bigger than a golf ball â€“ they should yield about 1.5 pounds). If you only have large tomatoes, make sure to de-seed them or the salad will be watery
